sections.title: Purity Legion Enforcer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Purity Legion Enforcer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with simple weapons plus falchion, scimitar, and shortbow, as well as light and medium armor and shields (except tower shields).

sections.title: Aura Sense (Sp) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Can cast detect chaos/evil/good/law at will as a spell-like ability, but only detects moderate or higher power auras and one alignment type at a time.

sections.title: Nonbeliever (Su) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Gains bonus equal to half class level on saves against divine spells and spell-like abilities, but must always attempt saves against beneficial divine magic.

sections.title: Divine Detective (Sp) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Can cast detect magic at will and gains bonuses on checks to identify divine spells, religious items, and divine magic items.

sections.title: Voice of Law (Ex) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Can use Intimidate as a standard action to demoralize all worshipers of a specific deity within 30 feet, imposing concentration penalties on affected divine spellcasters.

sections.title: Improved Godless Healing (Su) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Can use Godless Healing feat one additional time per day and heals extra 1d8 points per 3 levels (maximum 3d8 at 9th level).

sections.title: Confiscate (Ex) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Gains +2 bonus on disarm and steal combat maneuvers against divine items and can perform these maneuvers without provoking attacks of opportunity.

sections.title: Decree of Law (Ex) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Upgrades voice of law to a move action and grants +2 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls against creatures affected by voice of law.

sections.title: Discern Lies (Sp) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Can use discern lies as an immediate action for a number of rounds per day equal to enforcer level.

sections.title: Disruptive Critical (Su) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Critical hits against divine spellcasters temporarily sever their divine connection, preventing divine spellcasting until they make a concentration check.

sections.title: Edict of Law (Ex) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Upgrades voice of law to a swift action and extends the shaken condition to a minimum of 1 minute instead of 1 round.

sections.title: Iconoclast (Ex) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Gains +2 bonus on sunder combat maneuvers against divine items and can sunder them without provoking attacks of opportunity.

sections.title: Absolute Law (Ex) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Increases the damage bonus against creatures affected by voice of law ability from +2 to +4.

sections.title: Traces of Divinity (Su) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: When using detect magic on lingering divine auras, treats them as one strength level higher for duration and can sense the caster's aura on successful Spellcraft checks.

sections.title: Iron-Willed Atheist (Su) (Purity Legion Enforcer)
sections.description: Gains spell resistance equal to 11 + character level against divine spells and abilities (cannot be lowered voluntarily) and increases voice of law damage bonus to +6.
